sdwan.no_device_tips: You must add the device to one of the virtual networks in {cloud} to use this feature.
sdwan.device_tips: You have been added to the virtual network {network} . Please go to {cloud} to modify the settings.
sdwan.real_time_data_tips: Includes only the device's data that has passed through the Gateway; this may be different than the total reported by your billing data.
sdwan.interface_tips: You can disable specific interfaces joining connection aggregation.
sdwan.use_tips: AstroWarp is an innovative VPN platform designed for with GL.Routers that makes it easy to set exit node and connect multiple remote devices within a unified, secure network, enabling effortless remote access from anywhere.
sdwan.get_start_tips: Click to get started with AstroWarp!
sdwan.enable_tips: When AstroWarp is enabled, functions such as {feature} cannot be used.
sdwan.use_2b_tips: AstroWarp is an innovative VPN platform designed for routers that makes it easy to set exit node and connect multiple remote devices within a unified, secure network, enabling effortless remote access from anywhere.

aw.first_get_start_step1_tips: By using AstroWarp with this router, download app first then connect to this router and access the internet via it.
aw.first_get_start_step2_tips: Click start we will create a free AstroNet for you. And this router will be set as the internet exit.
aw.more_operation_tips: All clients and routers using internet exit access the internet via this router. If you need to modify the configuration, please log in to {page}.
aw.join_network_tips: Get start using AstroWarp for work from home anywhere. You can join a network to use it. Or you can login AstroWarp website to use it with more features.
aw.use_as_internet_exit_tips: This router has been set as internet exit.
aw.qrcode_use_tips: Use the app to scan the QR code or enter the URL to access the router and use the Internet exit it belongs to.
aw.bind_not_self_tips: Please bind your account to the Self view before using AstroWarp; it currently does not support use in the organization or VAR view.
aw.only_support_self_tips: AstroWarp is only supported on Self view.
aw.operate_config_tips: If you need to modify the configuration, please log in to {page}.
aw.add_client_limit_tips: The number of clients accessing this router has reached the upper limit. Please visit the AstroWarp to upgrade your network plan.
aw.add_router_limit_tips: The number of routers accessing in this network has reached the upper limit. Please visit the AstroWarp to edit your network.
aw.network_plan_expired_tips: This network is expired. Please visit the AstroWarp to upgrade/renew your network plan.
aw.get_start_common_tips: Get started for Work From Home that you can access internet and servers using this router as internet exit with its WAN IP wherever you are.
aw.get_start_has_networks_tips: Click the button, choose an exit node router to use and access internet and servers via it.
aw.first_get_start_download_app_tips: 1. Download AstroWarp app on your mobile phone or PC.
aw.first_get_start_click_tips: 2. Click the button to set this router as your internet exit node.
aw.first_get_start_use_app_tips: 3. Use app to scan or enter the code at the exit node page.
aw.install_app_title: Install the app to get started
aw.scan_qrcode_tips: Scan the QR code or enter the code in the AstroWarp app to securely access the internet and servers through this router.
aw.no_available_node_tips: There are no available exit nodes under your account. Please click the AstroWarp button to go to the admin panel to configure your exit node.
aw.select_node_tips: Choose an exit node to securely access the internet via it.
aw.confirm_node_tips: Confirm started securely access the internet via
aw.start_process_error_common_tips: Connection failed. An unknown error occurred. Please check your network or try again later. If the issue persists, contact support or submit feedback.
aw.exit_network_tips: Exiting will remove all previously added clients. To use Astrowrap again, you will need to re-add them. Are you sure you want to proceed?

astrowarp.access_code_expire_tips: This access code will expire in {time}.
astrowarp.ready_tips: Cloud service enabled. You can now access the AstroWarp service.
astrowarp.primary_mode_tips: Use this router as a fixed home router to access the home network for other devices to connect.
astrowarp.secondary_mode_tips: Use this router to connect to your home network remotely when away from home.
astrowarp.use_access_code_tips: Please enter this access code in the {app} or {secondary}.
astrowarp.add_dev_limit_tips: The number of connected devices has reached the network's limit.
astrowarp.sure_remove_tips: Are you sure you want to remove this device?
astrowarp.use_secondary_router_tips_1: 1. Log in to the admin panel of another router;
astrowarp.use_primary_router_tips_1: 1. Log in to the admin panel of another router;
astrowarp.use_primary_router_tips_3: 3. Select the router's usage as "Use At Home";
astrowarp.use_primary_router_tips_4: 4. Then you can see the access code.
astrowarp.access_code_verify_failed_tips: Verification failed. Make sure you enter the correct access code.
astrowarp.access_code_limit_tips: Connection failed. Connected routers have reached network's limit.
astrowarp.kicked_out_tips: Please enter new access code to connect.
astrowarp.primary_stop_tips: The home router has terminated the service. Cannot connect to the network.
astrowarp.secondary_disabled_tips_2: Click the button to reconnect to the home network.
astrowarp.internet_access_enabled_tips: You can access both your home network’s local resources and the Internet via this connection.
astrowarp.internet_access_disabled_tips: You can only access your home network’s local resources, not the Internet via this connection.
astrowarp.internet_access_when_disabled_tips: When disabled, you can only access your home network’s local resources, not the Internet via this connection.
astrowarp.primary_reset_tips: This will remove all connected devices and reset your AstroWarp settings. You need to recreate the AstroWarp connection.
astrowarp.primary_sure_reset_tips: Are you sure you want to proceed?
astrowarp.secondary_reset_tips: All current connection settings will not be retained.
astrowarp.secondary_sure_reset_tips: Are you sure you want to reset?
astrowarp.internet_access_when_enabled_tips: When enabled, you can access both your home network’s local resources and the Internet via this connection.
astrowarp.primary_connected_tips: You have successfully established a connection.
astrowarp.secondary_connected_tips: You have connected. Now you can remotely access the home network.
astrowarp.use_access_code_only_router_tips: Please enter this access code in the {secondary}.
astrowarp.add_dev_disabled_tips: Ensure the network is properly connected before adding a device.
astrowarp.click_get_started_tips: Please click "Get Started" button before slecting.
astrowarp.select_usage_title: Select the usage for this router
astrowarp.add_dev_not_normal_tips: Unable to add device: No available data.
astrowarp.access_network_tips: After verification, your devices can access your home network no matter where you are.
astrowarp.enter_access_code_tips: After verification, this router and the devices connected to it can access your home network.
astrowarp.please_enter_access_code_tips: Please enter the access code generated by your home router.
astrowarp.pay_code_title: Scan QR code to purchase a plan
astrowarp.pay_code_tips: You will be redirected to a legal website to renew the plan for this router:
astrowarp.remove_dev_tips: After removal, this device can no longer access your home network.
astrowarp.inp_access_code_wait_tips: Too many attempts. Please try again in {time}.
astrowarp.pay_to_gen_access_code_btn: Click to Purchase Plan to Generate Access Code
astrowarp.package_expired_tips: Service terminated as your plan has expired.
astrowarp.free_data_limit_tips: Service terminated as your free data has reached the usage limit.
astrowarp.purchase_tips: Please select a plan to activate service.
astrowarp.need_login_cloud_tips: Please login to the Cloud Sevice to complete the binding to continue using AstroWarp service.
astrowarp.welcome_tips: Experience true stealth and stable connection with AstroWarp.
astrowarp.welcome_tips2: It adopts the AmneziaWG protocol with built-in traffic obfuscation.Securely extends your home network globally. This allows you to browse with enhanced privacy and security — as seamlessly as if you were right at home.

astrowarp_err.timestamp_invalid_msg: Request failed: Timestamp is invalid. Please synchronize the router's time.
